Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2007 02:00PM dlrioux wrote: Hi, I just finished accelerated treatment, twice a day for 5 days. I can't compare to longer treatment but it is nice to be finished. I am very tired and sore. I worked through the first three days but took the last two off due to tiredness and migraine headache.  I am wondering how long the tiredness might last?
Posts.Title: Accelerated Radiation Therapy - Good Idea or Bad? amyshap momof2doxies
